Name: Atlantis Adventure VR
About the game: Atlantis Adventure is a First person Action Shooting VR game ▣ The game can run on both PC and VR platforms Jenny, the heroine, meets a clue to Atlantis, where the lost treasures live and breathe. I suggest going on an adventure with her best friend and colleague, Soldier, who has ventured with us. Such a great adventure begins !!!!! Atlantis Adventure is an action adventure game. You can meet the lost dinosaurs from the Jurassic Period. Hunting monsters from different ages in search of Atlantis treasures ◇ Join the great and immense adventure !!!!! ============================================================ • Diverse Jurassic Dinosaurs Together for the First Time • Win the battle against sharp and fierce raptors !!! • Defeat the Giant Tyrannosaurus !!! ( T-Rex ) • Destroy the vicious ancient stone monsters !!! • Detonate the golden monster, the middle boss monster !!! • Survive the gruesome battles with ancient giant stone statue monsters !!! • Colorful ancient beautiful backgrounds and structures ▶▷ The game can run on both PC and VR platforms. ============================================================== ◇ Three or more weapon systems (automatic switching according to battle) Battle with various monsters living in a colorful background Explore the remains of the living Atlantis Well, let's go on an adventure together !!!!!
